Articles.Content:
I wondering who will make a R-type series mod for ksp? Like the R-9A arrow head or the R-9D shooting star.

R-9A

or

R-9B1 Strider

Is this a good idea or not since the fighter have a wired anti-gravity thimg going on.
As long as there is a big enough interest, someone will probably be on it. Someone made a gundam fictional reactionless drive afterall.
So would anybody like to make this mod?

iv helped make parts of mods for other people in other game, (spotted this for when looking to see if there were any r-type mods for ksp lol) and i'll be willing to have a go at this, (yay R-type:cool:) but may take a while as iv yet to make a KSP mod
